entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LibraryImport with CLong produces SYSLIB1051 and requires disabling runtime marshalling #73975
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 and .NET Framework 4.8.1 return different value for `OSArchitecture` when running emulated as x86 #73974
  • Minimum .NET SDK version updated to 7.0.100 Preview 7 #73971
    Future
  • Consider obsoleting `RSA.EncryptValue`, `RSA.DecryptValue` #73969
    8.0.0
  • gcc ubsan reports pointer overflow in bitsetasshortlong perhaps a false positive #73964
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Test failures only when trimming #73961
  • When I try to create a handler in the client for a gRPC service HttpClientHandler.ClientCertificates is null #73960
  • SignedXml. Ability to call SignedInfo verification or improve return type. #73959
    Future
  • [debugger] Test failure - DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests.ExceptionTestUncaughtWithReload #73957
  • ILASM roundtrip failure - `src/tests/readytorun/tests/mainv2` #73954
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT descriptor file doesnt generate warnings #73952
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen on x86 for a function in collectible ALC #73951
    8.0.0
  • Open up internal JsonConfigurationFileParser to be public #73946
    Future
  • Visual Studio 2022 Remote Testing -.NET Framework 4.8 is installed, yet the.NET cannot be found during testing. #73940
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.1.22413.1] When calling Socket.EndReceiveFrom method throws SocketException in .NET 7.0 but throws ObjectDisposedException in .NET 6.0 #73936
  • Failures in SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Http3 #73930
    7.0.0
  • ubsan failure when calling through pointer to member function #73927
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT needs to understand SuppressTrimAnalysisWarnings #73926
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.RandomAccess_GetLength.ReturnsActualLengthForDevices(options: Asynchronous) #73925
    Future

Closed

  • Invalid docker tag used on 7.0-preview5 testing #73162
  • [WINARM][Regression] Fail to run the command – dotnet test --framework net7.0 --arch x64/x86 --diag:log.txt #72988
  • [wasm] Perftracing build broken due to trimming errors #73933
    7.0.0
  • `MissingMethodException` created with class+method name constructor has incorrect HRESULT #73750
    Future
  • Custom EventSources in shared library seem to have unused code #54859
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark is internal #49866
    7.0.0
  • Reading of Decimal broken for binary XmlDictionaryReader #73934
  • Newbie help on debugging libraries: Looking for a working vscode+linux debug setup for libraries #72841
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Clean up AOT Publishing #72415
    8.0.0
  • Regressions from "make SIP not on by default" #73784
    7.0.0
  • `ref` field support in .NET runtimes #63768
    7.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator tests failing on big-endian target (ref pointer type mismatch) #73775
    7.0.0
  • Change Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator to not use private reflection on XElement constructor #37970
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Test failures due to trimming errors on `main` #73932
    7.0.0
  • Reading application settings in NET WinForms OOP designer fails with exception 'Invalid URI: The hostname could not be parsed" #70318
    6.0.x
  • Separate Test Build & Test Run in Azure Pipelines #12475
    Future
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.CompilerServices #72408
    7.0.0
  • Source-build fails to build w/CS0208: Cannot take the address of, get the size of, or declare a pointer to a managed type #73850
    7.0.0
  • msbuild Publish fails with Error: Invalid directory size. #72425
    7.0.0
  • Add support for ILLink.Descriptors.xml #70810
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: !PreemptiveGCDisabled() #70307
    7.0.0
  • [arm64] Unexpected performance degradation for Vector128<short> #73921
    7.0.0
  • review SubtleCrypto fallback scenarios #69741
    8.0.0
  • (Unmanaged) Structs are not considered blittable by Emscripten / Blazor WASM AOT #61146
    7.0.0
  • The memory usage of the Aspnetcore program in the container is very low, and the gc is too aggressive and affects the performance #69423
    Future
  • Implement full GC suspension #67805
    7.0.0
  • Slow SSL Authentication on Ubuntu 16.04 / 18.04 #27666
    7.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler does not respect the Keep-Alive header #72958
    6.0.x
  • ProcessNameMatchesScriptName fails intermittently with NativeAot #73928
  • System.Numerics work planned for .NET 7 #47244
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add readme about how to run the template #71047
    8.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler.MaxResponseHeadersLength can cause internal 32-bit overflow with HTTP/2 #73848
    7.0.0
  • The same asp.net core application runs on windows and linux, the workspace memory usage is doubled #72557
    7.0.0
  • SetEnvironmentVariable does not work properly on Unix #9529
    Future
  • Repoint URL's to docs from corefx to runtime repo #73682
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix R2RDump in the presence of composite images #73979
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #73978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Annotate System.Private.DataContractSerialization #73977
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reenable HugeExpr Test on macOS ARM64 #73976
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 PGO/IBC to Windows and Linux builds #73973
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • hold reference to SslContextHandle to prevent crashes #73972
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Use buffer.Length as the source of truth for ReadDirectoryChanges' nBufferLength #73970
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • fix formatting of arm/arm64 addresses #73967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring back PreInitializedAttribute handling to NativeAOT #73966
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • add a null pointer guard around a usage of comp->vnStore #73958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Disable ILASM roundtrip for mainv2 test #73956
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement missing functionality for cctor invocation #73955
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • add guards around some calls to memset to silence ubsan #73953
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve Directory.CreateDirectory performance #73942
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Retry distributed transaction tests on MSDTC startup failure #73941
    area-System.Transactions
  • Add support for "known errors" to Fuzzlyn pipeline #73938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ignore LoopbackServer exceptions in MaxHeadersLength test #73937
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Port the incremental source generator polyfill code to the 6.0 servicing branch. #72219
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 6.0.9
  • Fix exceptions with missing HResult assignment #73948
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Avoid unused NetEventSource code #73868
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Fix finding the Python location if the %TEMP% path contains a space #72683
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add tests and improve binary XmlDictionaryReader performance #73332
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Add generation of structured object file dumps #73913
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update runtime repo to use Preview 7 SDK #72145
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make public EventBookmark's constructor and BookmarkText property #73548
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add support for `<TrimmerRootDescriptor>` #73935
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update byref bool native exports #73950
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize IndexOfAnyExcept for four values #73696
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Show address offsets in hex #73816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Reset current_no_gc_region_info after leaving no gc region implicitly #73806
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.9
  • [mono] Remove active issues for https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/57506 #73492
    area-System.Security
  • Fix issue#37970 #73552
    area-Serialization
  • Disable MaxResponseHeadersLength tests for HTTP/3 #73945
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Unix: Move 'FileNotFound to DirectoryNotFound' handling to GetExceptionForIoErrno. #70661
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix breakage from #70661 #73962
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept in RegexCompiler and source generator #73910
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Initialize variable prior to pedantic use. Caught by ubsan on a bool. #73626
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Make OCSP Stapling tests more reliable and more diagnosable #73632
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Workload runtimepack 6 #72147
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "supportsDebuggerProperties" from DAP #71148
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix unnecessary failure when Crossgen'ing dll's without proper Debug Directory data #73824
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, .NET, 7.0.0
  • Filter out Tailscale from LinkLocal address list #73911
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • Block intermittently failing Process test #73929
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [wasm] cleanup testing and host support in templates and tests #73785
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [NativeAot] Enable a couple more libs tests #73756
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Repoint urls in docs #73766
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify MaxResponseHeadersLength calculations #73907
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix "command is not pending" #72953
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #73871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Fix handling of corrupted state exceptions on Windows #73889
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read when searching a memory mapped file #67386
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Gradual decommit in wks #73620
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Vectorize LastIndexOf and LastIndexOfAnyExcept without code duplication #73768
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Memory
  • Add intrinsic for SpanHelpers.Char.IndexOfAny on AArch64 #73788
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • fix handling of client cert on macOS #73574
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] amend the tests' building on LA64. #73840
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Add extra NativeAOT test legs #73547
    area-Infrastructure
